section.title: <title>
section.para: A section title text in the dialog.

section.title: Examples
section.programlisting:
<prefs>
<title label="Appearance"/>
<uri label="Background Image:" bind="Dsp.win.bg_uri"/>
<enum label="Style:" bind="style"> <item label="Classic" value="classic"/> <item label="Modern" value="modern"/> </enum>
</prefs>
